Name: Soulslinger
About the game: Alice, the reaper girl, found herself lost in the Underworld! She must escape this forgotten land before the corruption takes over everything, but she's not alone! With the help of a Soulvolver, a weapon capable of shooting souls, and her new friends, Alice will face the dangers and become, once and for all, a Soulslinger. Reaping an enemy soul will recover your Soulvolver ammo! Breaking objects and defeating enemies helps the level progression, the more you break, the faster you'll progress! Blessings and curses are permanent power ups, each one with it's own special effect! Pies are consumable temporary power ups, each one with it's own purpose; use them wisely! Three levels of difficulty; Five stages, each one with its own boss; Nineteen different blessings to obtain; Five flavors of pies; Four playable characters; 20+ hats to collect; Endless mode. WASD or Arrow Keys - Move Left Mouse Button - Attack Hold left mouse button for autoswing Right Mouse Button - Switch weapon Shift or Space - Use pie P or Esc - Pause Enter - Confirm F4 - Toggle fullscreen Controller: Left Stick or Direction Pad - Move A, X, Shoulders or Triggers - Attack Right Stick - Move cursor, aim and switch weapon B or Y - Use pie Start - Pause A - Confirm Back - Open Steam Friends
